basics.name: Mark Rice
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Python enthusiast working on fun problems. Let's chat Python!

work.summary:
Responsible for starting a Natural Language Processing project to
    cast Sentiment Analysis on published works to validate relationships between
    different scientific entities. Designing fitness algorithms to further weight
    different papers based on journal/subject/relatedness. Mined Drug Interaction
    database, for augmenting directed biological networks with drugs. Creating
    User dashboard to interact with DB, and validate underlying biology.

Lead development of High Performance Computing core for Clinical
    Systems Biology Lab at NSU. Also built toolboxes and libraries for experiments
    on ternary logic based directed graphs.

Brought on to translate existing code written by researchers to
    a distributed high performance computing platform with optimized performance
    and algorithms.
